title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Search-Based Generative Learning: Mobile Solutions for Language Proficiency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and intermediate-level language knowledge
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can retrieve learned language concepts with 80% accuracy through retrieval-based quizzes within 4 weeks.
Learners can complete three types of creative writing assignments using language rules learned by week 8.
Learners can improve the quality of generative activities by at least two levels through peer assessment and feedback by the end of week 12.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
